channel.title: I got a Simple Question
channel.description:
Can you code a server with c++? I've been wondering this for a long time, Since I came back from Game creating. I know C++ VERY well. I forgot most of Java and Would like to know If you can do this. Is it possible? I know some Java Basics.. If I could somehow incorporate C++ Then I could re-Learn Java and Experiment with it. BASE: Devolution Client: Galkons Base
If anyone knows Please Comment ASAP.
Thanks -Project Territh

item.title: I got a Simple Question
item.dc:creator: @_BBLLAARRGGHH __--BBLLAARRGGHH--__
item.description:
@_BBLLAARRGGHH wrote:

@topic. It’s possible, as with most things. But it is extremely difficult, and probably not worth it.
@SirPali “Answer”

Read full topic

item.title: I got a Simple Question
item.dc:creator: @Project_Territh Project Territh
item.description:
@Project_Territh wrote:

Ok, I’ll try that Thanks again.

Read full topic

item.title: I got a Simple Question
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Project Territh:

Maybe I just Don’t know It as well as I think Well thanks for your Comment David, I’ll probably go back to learning good old Java.

I didn’t mean to discourage you from your goal. If you really want to do it search for “C++ server” on Google.

EDIT: I know nothing about C++ tbh, so I don’t know if it’s possible.

Read full topic

item.title: I got a Simple Question

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Well how did the first RSPS programmers know if it was possible? It’s because they knew the language. If you really know the language you will know the answer.

Read full topic

item.title: I got a Simple Question
item.dc:creator: @Project_Territh Project Territh
item.description:
@Project_Territh wrote:

At Davidi2 I know C++ well, but I suck at Java so… How would I be able to Figure this out with Almost no skills at Java?
C++ Is complicated but How should i know the answer just Cause I know c++? Please explain.

Read full topic

item.title: I got a Simple Question
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

If you know C++ so well then you should know the answer.

Read full topic

item.title: I got a Simple Question
item.dc:creator: @Project_Territh Project Territh
item.description:
@Project_Territh wrote:

Im just asking… Lesterknom if it’s possible. I’m working on It right now if anyone want to see message me. I honestly Don’t know where to start. =( @ Sir I think your right, Sticking with Java basics would be best. It would just be kinda cool to see it with c++.

Read full topic

item.title: I got a Simple Question
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Hmm. Interesting question.
I think the anwser/awnser(sp? I always mess this up) would be no though, considering the cache is in java afaik.
All clients are in java too, so I’m not quite sure if it would be possible to bind these together…

Read full topic
